page.deprecated: The *[xb:SOCKETS]* object is deprecated and may be removed in a future release. Use *[link:INET::Socket@https://documentation.alphasoftware.com/index?search=api%20inet%20namespace%20socket%20class%20index]* instead.
page.description: Reads a line from the socket, if one is available (else returns blank).

argument.name: Data
argument.description: Binary data returned from the socket.

page.discussion: The .READLINE() method reads the data from the socket buffer up to the end of the line. Returns blank if there is no data.
